sentences: Vaimupuuetega laste õpetamiseks on vaja eriteadlikkust.
Abikooli suunatud lapsed saavad spetsiaalset tuge.
Mõnes piirkonnas kasutati terminit 'laste' kreekakatoliku koolide kohta.
context: The word 'laste' is the genitive plural form of the Estonian word 'laps', meaning 'child'. It can be translated as 'children', 'pups', or 'students' in English. In the context provided, it refers to children with disabilities who are directed to special schools (abikooli suunatud lapsed) or students attending lower-level Greek Catholic schools in historical contexts.
